tech_news.title: Asus and Dell announce new mini PCs for Windows 365 - Notebookcheck
tech_news.description: Dell and Asus have announced new mini PCs intended for use with Windows 365. These systems will not power themselves, but will simply allow users to operate Windows running in the cloud.
